summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.6°C), outside temperature (down 3.5°C), and inside temperature (down 1.6°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.3 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 327 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 3555 lux) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, humidity should not be a concern and a light breeze will be noticeable. A few light raindrops may fall, cloud cover will be low, possibly causing overcast or foggy conditions, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
